title: Request approval to work on the advertized project of Batch 1: Self-made frontend
body:
About
I am an entrepreneur, 100% crypto and DeFi addict , and self taught programmer who is also head of a team of four wonderful developers (all more talented than I am !). Tech stack used across our team is wide and and growing, and includes but is not limited to:

Ruby
Rails (and associated technologies)
Javascript
Python
Typescript
React
Express
Mongo DB
Postgres
UI/UX
(There are also team members learning, but not yet fluent, in Solidity.)

Our motivation for getting involved in this project is to help the community, but also to gain first hand knowledge of how a DAO operates and specifically understand Rari, with the goal of becoming partners, growing the project and getting it adopted in our part of the world. There is no better way to do this than taking a deep dive and getting our hands dirty.

Prototype
Please view here our prototypes/samples we created by following these links:

1. A dark themed design:
https://bit.ly/2SLeNE2

2. Same as above with different color scheme:
https://bit.ly/3cSwqZs

3. Material design:
https://bit.ly/3vBrnmL

These are just rough, preliminary samples. The finished work will be more polished and will include popups that appear on user interaction and other information (eg usdc balance, yield earned) specific and relevant to user. Community input is welcome and will be sought during development.

Hosting
As per project specification: decentralized hosting using Fleek/IFPS

Project Completion
21 days from formal approval (+/- 7 days).
Our work will be hosted on Github and progress may be tracked by community members.

Payment
$4000 (US) in total. $3500 in USDC and $500 in RGT
Payment to be made within 3 days of completion of project after audit by Rari Team.

Excited to do this and hope our proposal passes.
author: 0x7e6c513eA08415Ffb179f37Aa72d5bAD87095f01
